name: FetchListMembershipsOrdered
description:
Fetch list memberships ordered by addition date.

Fetch the memberships of a HubSpot CRM list, ordered by the date they were added. Useful for retrieving member records in an ascending order based on addition time, or in descending order if a 'before' offset is used.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ILS ID of the list to retrieve memberships from.

parameters.name: after_paging_offset_token
parameters.description: The token for the page that comes after the previously requested records, sorted in ascending order. Takes precedence over 'before'.

value_schema.description:
The paging offset token for the page that comes `after` the previously requested records.

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records following the offset, sorted in *ascending* order. Takes precedence over the `before` offset.

parameters.name: before_offset_token
parameters.description: The paging offset token to retrieve records preceding the specified page, sorted in descending order.

value_schema.description:
The paging offset token for the page that comes `before` the previously requested records.

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records preceding the offset, sorted in *descending* order.

parameters.name: record_limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return, with a maximum limit of 250.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return in the response. The maximum `limit` is 250.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description:
The paging offset token for the page that comes `after` the previously requested records.

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records following the offset, sorted in *ascending* order. Takes precedence over the `before` offset.

value_schema.description:

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records following the offset, sorted in *ascending* order. Takes precedence over the `before` offset.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description:
The paging offset token for the page that comes `before` the previously requested records.

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records preceding the offset, sorted in *descending* order.

value_schema.description:
The paging offset token for the page that comes `before` the previously requested records.

If provided, then the records in the response will be the records preceding the offset, sorted in *descending* order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return in the response. The maximum `limit` is 250.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return in the response. The maximum `limit` is 250.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
